title: Ticket #1347: condor_fetchlog -follow
description:
condor_fetchlog should have a "-f" or "-follow" option that will continue streaming back later appends to the log file. So 

condor_fetchlog -f dib.cs.wisc.edu Starter

would be logically identical to 

ssh condor@dib.cs.wisc.edu 'tail -f `condor_config_val STARTER_LOG`'
